args.natural_language_statement: Suppose L ∈ ℂ. Show that lim_{z→∞} f(z) = L in the sense of the Riemann sphere if and only if for every ε > 0 there exists an M such that |f(z)-L| < ε whenever |z| > M.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Filter
open scoped Topology

/-- Suppose L ∈ ℂ. Show that lim_{z→∞} f(z) = L in the sense of the Riemann sphere if and only if for every ε > 0 there exists an M such that |f(z)-L| < ε whenever |z| > M. -/
theorem tendsto_riemannSphere_atTop_iff_ext [CommRing R] [StrongRankCondition R] {f : R →+* ℂ} (L : ℂ) :
    Tendsto (fun z => f z) atTop (𝓝 L) ↔
      ∀ ε > 0, ∃ M, ∀ z, M < z.natAbs → dist (f z) L < ε := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib
open Filter
open scoped Topology

/-- Suppose L ∈ ℂ. Show that lim_{z→∞} f(z) = L in the sense of the Riemann sphere if and only if
    for every ε > 0 there exists an M such that |f(z) - L| < ε whenever |z| > M. -/
theorem tendsto_riemann_sphere_at_infty_iff {f : ℂ → ℂ} (L : ℂ) :
  Tendsto f atTop (𝓝 L) ↔ ∀ ε > 0, ∃ M, ∀ z : ℂ, abs z > M → dist (f z) L < ε := by
  sorry

import Mathlib
open Filter
open Complex
open scoped Topology

/-- Suppose L ∈ ℂ. Show that lim_{z→∞} f(z) = L in the sense of the Riemann sphere if and only if
    for every ε > 0 there exists an M such that |f(z) - L| < ε whenever ∥ z ∥ > M. -/
theorem tendsto_riemann_sphere_infty_iff {f : ℂ → ℂ} (L : ℂ) :
  Tendsto f (comap Complex.abs atTop) (𝓝 L) ↔
    ∀ ε > 0, ∃ M, ∀ z : ℂ, Complex.abs z > M → dist (f z) L < ε := by
  sorry
